data.name: note
data.description: Is the message a private note?

data.name: assigned_group
data.description: The name of the assigned group

data.name: assignee
data.description: The email of the agent to assign the ticket to

data.name: body
data.description: The body of the first comment to add to the ticket

data.name: from
data.description: The email address of the agent or customer who sent the ticket or hash of customer attributes

data.name: note
data.description: When creating a ticket from an agent, should the message body be added as a private note

data.name: send_copy_to_customer
data.description: When creating a ticket from an agent, should the message be emailed to the customer

data.name: state
data.description: The ticket state. Allowed states are: "unread", "opened", "follow_up", "pending", "closed", "spam"

data.name: to
data.description: The email address of the customer or mailbox that the ticket is addressed to or a hash of customer attributes

data.name: per_page
data.description: The number of messages to return per page (max 50)

data.name: per_page
data.description: The number of messages to return per page (max 50)

data.name: assignee
data.description: The email address of the assignee or "unassigned" to find all unassigned tickets

data.name: customer
data.description: Returns tickets belonging to the specified customer

data.name: per_page
data.description: The number of messages to return per page (max 50)

data.name: state
data.description: Returns tickets with the specified state only

description: Groove is a simple tool for growing small businesses - help your team deliver personal customer support.  Ticket management, tracking and reports, and email integration.
name: v1
